TITLE: Standard API Response Format DESCRIPTION: The standard JSON response format used by all SiYuan API endpoints. Contains code, message and data fields. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": {} } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Executing SQL Queries in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint executes SQL queries on the SiYuan database. It requires an SQL statement as a parameter and returns the query results. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "stmt": "SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE content LIKE'%content%' LIMIT 7" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "col": "val" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Uploading Assets in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint handles asset uploads. It accepts an HTTP Multipart form with the assets directory path and file list. It returns information about successfully uploaded files and any errors encountered. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "errFiles": [""], "succMap": { "foo.png": "assets/foo-20210719092549-9j5y79r.png" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Inserting Blocks in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint inserts new blocks. It requires the data type, content, and positioning information (next block ID, previous block ID, or parent block ID). It returns the newly inserted block's DOM and ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "dataType": "markdown", "data": "foo**bar**{: style=\"color: var(--b3-font-color8);\"}baz", "nextID": "", "previousID": "20211229114650-vrek5x6", "parentID": "" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "doOperations": [ { "action": "insert", "data": "
foobarbaz
", "id": "20211230115020-g02dfx0", "parentID": "", "previousID": "20211229114650-vrek5x6", "retData": null } ], "undoOperations": null } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating a Block in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint updates an existing block. It requires the data type, new content, and block ID. It returns the updated block's DOM. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "dataType": "markdown", "data": "foobarbaz", "id": "20211230161520-querkps" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "doOperations": [ { "action": "update", "data": "
foobarbaz
", "id": "20211230161520-querkps", "parentID": "", "previousID": "", "retData": null } ], "undoOperations": null } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Uploading Files in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint uploads a file or creates a directory. It uses HTTP Multipart form for parameters, including file path, whether to create a directory, modification time, and the file content. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_28 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Appending Blocks in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint appends new blocks to a parent block. It requires the data type, content, and parent block ID. It returns the newly inserted block's DOM and ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "data": "foo**bar**{: style=\"color: var(--b3-font-color8);\"}baz", "dataType": "markdown", "parentID": "20220107173950-7f9m1nb" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "doOperations": [ { "action": "insert", "data": "
foobarbaz
", "id": "20220108003642-y2wmpcv", "parentID": "20220107173950-7f9m1nb", "previousID": "20220108003615-7rk41t1", "retData": null } ], "undoOperations": null } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Prepending Blocks in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint prepends new blocks to a parent block. It requires the data type, content, and parent block ID. It returns the newly inserted block's DOM and ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "data": "foo**bar**{: style=\"color: var(--b3-font-color8);\"}baz", "dataType": "markdown", "parentID": "20220107173950-7f9m1nb" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "doOperations": [ { "action": "insert", "data": "
foobarbaz
", "id": "20220108003710-hm0x9sc", "parentID": "20220107173950-7f9m1nb", "previousID": "", "retData": null } ], "undoOperations": null } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting a Block in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint deletes an existing block. It requires the block ID to be deleted. It returns a confirmation of the deletion action. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20211230161520-querkps" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "doOperations": [ { "action": "delete", "data": null, "id": "20211230162439-vtm09qo", "parentID": "", "previousID": "", "retData": null } ], "undoOperations": null } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving IDs by Human-Readable Path in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint retrieves block IDs based on a given human-readable path and notebook ID. It requires the path and notebook ID as input and returns a list of matching block IDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "path": "/foo/bar", "notebook": "20210808180117-czj9bvb" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ "20200813004931-q4cu8na" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Block Attributes in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint sets attributes for a specified block. It requires the block ID and a dictionary of attributes to be set. Custom attributes must be prefixed with 'custom-'. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20210912214605-uhi5gco", "attrs": { "custom-attr1": "line1\nline2" } } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Moving a Block in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint moves an existing block to a new location. It requires the block ID to be moved, and either the previous block ID or parent block ID for positioning. It returns a confirmation of the move action. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20230406180530-3o1rqkc", "previousID": "20230406152734-if5kyx6", "parentID": "20230404183855-woe52ko" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "doOperations": [ { "action": "move", "data": null, "id": "20230406180530-3o1rqkc", "parentID": "20230404183855-woe52ko", "previousID": "20230406152734-if5kyx6", "nextID": "", "retData": null, "srcIDs": null, "name": "", "type": "" } ], "undoOperations": null } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Human-Readable Path by ID in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint retrieves the human-readable path based on a given block ID. It requires the block ID as input and returns the corresponding path. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20210917220056-yxtyl7i" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": "/foo/bar" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Storage Path by ID in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint retrieves the storage path based on a given block ID. It requires the block ID as input and returns the notebook ID and file path. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20210808180320-fqgskfj" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "notebook": "20210808180117-czj9bvb", "path": "/20200812220555-lj3enxa/20210808180320-fqgskfj.sy" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fetching Child Blocks in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint retrieves the child blocks of a specified parent block. It requires the parent block ID as a parameter and returns an array of child block information, including their IDs, types, and subtypes. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20230506212712-vt9ajwj" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "id": "20230512083858-mjdwkbn", "type": "h", "subType": "h1" }, { "id": "20230513213727-thswvfd", "type": "s" }, { "id": "20230513213633-9lsj4ew", "type": "l", "subType": "u" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving File Content in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint retrieves the content of a specified file. It requires the file path under the workspace path as a parameter and returns the file content or an exception message. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "path": "/data/20210808180117-6v0mkxr/20200923234011-ieuun1p.sy" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 404, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Block Attributes in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint retrieves all attributes of a specified block. It requires the block ID as a parameter and returns a dictionary of the block's attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20210912214605-uhi5gco" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "custom-attr1": "line1\nline2", "id": "20210912214605-uhi5gco", "title": "PDF Annotation Demo", "type": "doc", "updated": "20210916120715" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Files in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint lists files and directories in a specified directory. It requires the directory path under the workspace path as a parameter and returns information about the contents of the directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "path": "/data/20210808180117-6v0mkxr/20200923234011-ieuun1p" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": [ { "isDir": true, "isSymlink": false, "name": "20210808180303-6yi0dv5", "updated": 1691467624 }, { "isDir": false, "isSymlink": false, "name": "20210808180303-6yi0dv5.sy", "updated": 1663298365 } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Transferring Block References in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint transfers block references from one block to another. It requires the source block ID, target block ID, and optionally the specific reference block IDs to be transferred. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "fromID": "20230612160235-mv6rrh1", "toID": "20230613093045-uwcomng", "refIDs": ["20230613092230-cpyimmd"] } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Exporting Markdown Content in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint exports the Markdown content of a specified document. It requires the ID of the document block to export and returns the human-readable path and Markdown content. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_32 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "hPath": "/Please Start Here", "content": "## 🍫 Content Block\n\nIn SiYuan, the only important core concept is..." } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Block Kramdown in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint retrieves the kramdown content of a specified block. It requires the block ID as a parameter and returns the block's ID and kramdown content. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20201225220954-dlgzk1o" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "id": "20201225220954-dlgzk1o", "kramdown": "* {: id=\"20201225220954-e913snx\"}Create a new notebook, create a new document under the notebook\n {: id=\"20210131161940-kfs31q6\"}\n* {: id=\"20201225220954-ygz217h\"}Enter / in the editor to trigger the function menu\n {: id=\"20210131161940-eo0riwq\"}\n* {: id=\"20201225220954-875yybt\"}((20200924101200-gss5vee \"Navigate in the content block\")) and ((20200924100906-0u4zfq3 \"Window and tab\"))\n {: id=\"20210131161940-b5uow2h\"}" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Files in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint removes a specified file. It requires the file path under the workspace path as a parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "path": "/data/20210808180117-6v0mkxr/20200923234011-ieuun1p.sy" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Renaming Files in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint renames a file. It requires the current file path and the new file path, both under the workspace path. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_30 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "path": "/data/assets/image-20230523085812-k3o9t32.png", "newPath": "/data/assets/test-20230523085812-k3o9t32.png" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pushing Notifications in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint pushes a notification message. It requires the message content and an optional timeout duration for the message display. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "msg": "test", "timeout": 7000 } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "id": "62jtmqi" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pushing Error Notifications in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint pushes an error notification message. It requires the error message content and an optional timeout duration for the message display. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_36 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "msg": "test", "timeout": 7000 } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "id": "qc9znut" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Folding a Block in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint folds a specified block. It requires the block ID to be folded. It returns a confirmation of the action. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20231224160424-2f5680o" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Unfolding a Block in SiYuan Note API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint unfolds a specified block. It requires the block ID to be unfolded. It returns a confirmation of the action. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20231224160424-2f5680o" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Templates in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint renders a specified template. It requires the ID of the document where the rendering is called and the absolute path of the template file. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "20220724223548-j6g0o87", "path": "F:\\SiYuan\\data\\templates\\foo.md" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "content": "
foo
​
", "path": "F:\\SiYuan\\data\\templates\\foo.md" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Exporting Resources in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint exports specified files and folders as a zip file. It requires a list of file or folder paths to be exported and an optional name for the exported file. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_33 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "paths": [ "/conf/appearance/boot", "/conf/appearance/langs", "/conf/appearance/emojis/conf.json", "/conf/appearance/icons/index.html" ], "name": "zip-file-name" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "path": "temp/export/zip-file-name.zip" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: List Notebooks Response DESCRIPTION: Response format for listing all notebooks in the system. Returns an array of notebook objects with ID, name, icon and status. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "notebooks": [ { "id": "20210817205410-2kvfpfn", "name": "Test Notebook", "icon": "1f41b", "sort": 0, "closed": false }, { "id": "20210808180117-czj9bvb", "name": "SiYuan User Guide", "icon": "1f4d4", "sort": 1, "closed": false } ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Sprig Templates in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint renders a Sprig template. It requires the template content as a parameter and returns the rendered result. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "template": "/daily note/{{now | date \"2006/01\"}}/{{now | date \"2006-01-02\"}}" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": "/daily note/2023/03/2023-03-24" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: System Current Time Response DESCRIPTION: JSON response format for the current time API endpoint, returning timestamp in milliseconds. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_41 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": 1631850968131 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Flushing SQLite Transaction in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint flushes the current SQLite transaction. It doesn't require any parameters and returns a success status. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Forward Proxy Request Parameters DESCRIPTION: JSON schema for the forward proxy API endpoint parameters. Includes URL, method, timeout, content type, headers, payload and encoding options. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_37 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "url": "https://b3log.org/siyuan/", "method": "GET", "timeout": 7000, "contentType": "text/html", "headers": [ { "Cookie": "" } ], "payload": {}, "payloadEncoding": "text", "responseEncoding": "text" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Converting Files with Pandoc in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This API endpoint converts files using Pandoc. It requires a directory name and Pandoc command line arguments. The working directory for the conversion is set to a specific path under the workspace. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "dir": "test", "args": [ "--to", "markdown_strict-raw_html", "foo.epub", "-o", "foo.md" ] } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "path": "/temp/convert/pandoc/test" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Forward Proxy Response Format DESCRIPTION: JSON schema showing the response format from the forward proxy endpoint, including status code, body, headers and timing information. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_38 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "body": "", "bodyEncoding": "text", "contentType": "text/html", "elapsed": 1976, "headers": { }, "status": 200, "url": "https://b3log.org/siyuan" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Forward Proxy Request in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint acts as a forward proxy, allowing HTTP requests to be made through the SiYuan application. It supports various HTTP methods, custom headers, and payload encodings. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API_zh_CN.md#2025-04-10_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "url": "https://b3log.org/siyuan/", "method": "GET", "timeout": 7000, "contentType": "text/html", "headers": [ { "Cookie": "" } ], "payload": {}, "payloadEncoding": "text", "responseEncoding": "text" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "body": "", "bodyEncoding": "text", "contentType": "text/html", "elapsed": 1976, "headers": { }, "status": 200, "url": "https://b3log.org/siyuan" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Notebook Operations Request Format DESCRIPTION: Common request format for notebook operations like open, close, rename and remove. Takes notebook ID as parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "notebook": "20210831090520-7dvbdv0" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Exporting Markdown Content in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint exports the Markdown content of a specified document block. It returns the human-readable path and the Markdown content. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API_zh_CN.md#2025-04-10_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "hPath": "/0 请从这里开始", "content": "## 🍫 内容块\n\n在思源中，唯一重要的核心概念是..." } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pushing Notification Message in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint pushes a notification message to the user interface. It allows specifying the message content and display duration, returning a unique message ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API_zh_CN.md#2025-04-10_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "msg": "test", "timeout": 7000 } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "id": "62jtmqi" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pushing Error Message in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint pushes an error message notification to the user interface. It allows specifying the error message content and display duration, returning a unique message ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API_zh_CN.md#2025-04-10_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "msg": "test", "timeout": 7000 } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "id": "qc9znut" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Current System Time in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves the current system time of the SiYuan application in milliseconds since the Unix epoch. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API_zh_CN.md#2025-04-10_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": 1631850968131 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: System Version Response DESCRIPTION: JSON response format for the system version API endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_40 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": "1.3.5" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: System Boot Progress Response DESCRIPTION: JSON response format for the boot progress API endpoint showing completion status and details. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_39 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "details": "Finishing boot...", "progress": 100 } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Create Notebook Request/Response DESCRIPTION: Request and response format for creating a new notebook. Takes notebook name as input and returns the created notebook details. SOURCE: https://github.com/siyuan-note/siyuan/blob/master/API.md#2025-04-10_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Notebook name" } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "code": 0, "msg": "", "data": { "notebook": { "id": "20220126215949-r1wvoch", "name": "Notebook name", "icon": "", "sort": 0, "closed": false } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Converting Files using Pandoc in SiYuan API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint uses Pandoc to convert files.
